description.english: Revive the Everlasting Cherry Blossom tree with your wishes.
description.schinese: 以你的愿望使不枯樱重新绽放。

description.english: Catch a few lucky sights and sensations while nursing a friend.
description.schinese: 在看护朋友的同时，捕捉一些幸运的景象和感觉。

description.english: Catch your neighbor in a compromising position.
description.schinese: 发现你的邻居处于尴尬的境地。

description.english: Deflect a curse onto the caster.
description.schinese: 将诅咒反弹到施术者身上。

description.english: Get trapped alone with your underclassman.
description.schinese: 和你的学妹单独被困。

description.english: Next time, your cousin should lock the door.
description.schinese: 下次，你堂姐应该锁门。

description.english: Follow Suginami's advice and meet a robot that runs on bananas.
description.schinese: 听从杉并的建议，遇到一个靠香蕉运转的机器人。

description.english: Have your first kiss stolen by one of the heroines.
description.schinese: 让你的初吻被一位女主角夺走。

displayName.english: Let Me Tell An Old Story

description.english: Complete the Prologue
description.schinese: 完成序章

description.english: View all of Mikoto's scenes.
description.schinese: 解锁美琴的所有场景。

description.english: Listen to all of Raina's radio segments
description.schinese: 收听赖奈的所有广播片段

description.english: Be admitted to Weather Vane as a first year prep student in Class A.
description.schinese: 被风见鸡录取为预科一年级A班学生。

description.english: Have a strange new necklace placed around your neck by your class leader.
description.schinese: 让监督生把一条奇怪的新项链戴在你的脖子上。

description.english: Discover that Holmes' partner is a man in a skirt.
description.schinese: 发现福尔摩斯的搭档是一个穿着裙子的男生。

description.english: Review the fundamental basics of magic.
description.schinese: 复习魔法的基本知识。

description.english: Give both Himeno and Sara advice during gnilruc practice.
description.schinese: 在杖魔球练习期间，向姬乃和莎拉提供建议。

description.english: Raise the stakes on the class competition.
description.schinese: 提高班级竞争的赌注。

description.english: Get kidnapped by your enemies, then rescued by a heroine.
description.schinese: 被你的敌人绑架，然后被一位女主角救出来。

description.english: Complete Ultimate Battle of the Fated Encounter.
description.schinese: 完成邂逅无敌大作战。

description.english: Receive your very first mission from the Queen.
description.schinese: 接受女王的第一次任务。

description.english: Dispel the forces afflicting London's Tower Bridge.
description.schinese: 驱散妨碍伦敦塔桥的力量。

description.english: Get tricked into helping the student council and running for office.
description.schinese: 被拐去帮助学生会并竞选公职。

description.english: Stretch your muscles with each possible partner.
description.schinese: 与每个可能的伴侣一起拉伸肌肉。

description.english: Decipher Suginami's cryptic demand.
description.schinese: 破译杉并的神秘要求。

description.english: Face a criminal who injured someone, then put someone in a coma.
description.schinese: 面对一个打伤了人并让人陷入昏迷的罪犯。

description.english: Pair with Himeno and Sara on your second mission from the Queen.
description.schinese: 与姬乃和莎拉搭档执行女王的第二次任务。

description.english: Pair with Ricca on your second mission from the Queen.
description.schinese: 与莉卡搭档执行女王的第二次任务。

description.english: Thoroughly investigate all the locations in Westminster.
description.schinese: 彻底调查威斯敏斯特的所有地点。

description.english: Thoroughly investigate all the locations in Piccadilly.
description.schinese: 彻底调查皮卡迪利大街的所有地点。

description.english: Thoroughly investigate all the locations in Buckingham.
description.schinese: 彻底调查白金汉的所有地点。

description.english: Thoroughly investigate Himeno during your second mission.
description.schinese: 在你的第二次任务中彻底调查姬乃。

description.english: Thoroughly investigate Sara during your second mission.
description.schinese: 在你的第二次任务中彻底调查莎拉。

description.english: Thoroughly investigate Ricca during your second mission.
description.schinese: 在你的第二次任务中彻底调查莉卡。

description.english: Talk to everyone during the investigations of your second mission.
description.schinese: 在第二次任务的调查过程中与每个人交谈。

description.english: Complete your second mission successfully
description.schinese: 成功完成第二次任务

description.english: Win the bet to determine the Christmas menu.
description.schinese: 赢得赌注以确定圣诞菜单。

description.english: Receive your third mission from the Queen.
description.schinese: 接受女王的第三次任务。

description.english: Face a terrorist who operates alone, then face her organization.
description.schinese: 面对一个单独行动的恐怖分子，然后面对她的组织。

description.english: Thoroughly investigate all the locations in Hyde Park Hotel.
description.schinese: 彻底调查海德公园酒店的所有地点。

description.english: Thoroughly investigate Himeno during your third mission.
description.schinese: 在你的第三次任务中彻底调查姬乃。

description.english: Thoroughly investigate Sara during your third mission.
description.schinese: 在你的第三次任务中彻底调查莎拉。

description.english: Thoroughly investigate Ricca during your third mission.
description.schinese: 在你的第三次任务中彻底调查莉卡。

description.english: Talk to everyone during the investigations of your third mission.
description.schinese: 在第三次任务的调查过程中与每个人交谈。

description.english: Defuse a bomb and save lives.
description.schinese: 拆除炸弹，拯救人命。

description.english: Get kidnapped and locked in a storage room.
description.schinese: 被绑架并被关在储藏室里。

description.english: Receive thanks from your long-time foe.
description.schinese: 被你的宿敌感谢

description.english: Experience every heroine's method of waking you up.
description.schinese: 体验每一个女主角唤醒你的方法。

description.english: Win the student council election.
description.schinese: 赢得学生会选举。

description.english: Escort your little sister through the Christmas Party.
description.schinese: 陪护你的妹妹参加圣诞晚会。

description.english: Fight a robot with Ricca and kiss in the snow.
description.schinese: 与莉卡对抗机器人，并在雪中接吻。

description.english: Enjoy some sweets and become the man Sara relies on.
description.schinese: 享用一些甜点，成为莎拉所依靠的人。

description.english: Spend the Christmas Party with Santa herself.
description.schinese: 和圣诞老人本人一起度过圣诞派对。

description.english: View all the optional scenes featuring Tomoe.
description.schinese: 解锁以巴为主角的所有可选场景。

description.english: View all the optional scenes featuring Elizabeth.
description.schinese: 解锁以伊丽莎白为主角的所有可选场景。

description.english: View all the optional scenes featuring Sakura.
description.schinese: 解锁以樱为主角的所有可选场景。

displayName.english: Spending Time with Mary and Edward
displayName.schinese: 与玛丽和爱德华共度时光

description.english: View all the optional scenes featuring Mary and Edward.
description.schinese: 解锁以玛丽和爱德华为主角的所有可选场景。

displayName.english: Spending Time With Ian and Rurika
displayName.schinese: 与伊恩和瑠璃香共度时光

description.english: View all the optional scenes featuring Ian and Rurika.
description.schinese: 解锁以伊恩和瑠璃香为主角的所有可选场景。

displayName.english: Spending Time With Kousuke and Shiki
displayName.schinese: 与耕助和四季共度时光

description.english: View all the optional scenes featuring Kousuke and Shiki.
description.schinese: 解锁以耕助和四季为主角的所有可选场景。

description.english: View all the optional scenes featuring Suginami.
description.schinese: 解锁杉并的所有可选场景。

description.english: Listen to all of Laina's radio segments.
description.schinese: 收听莱娜的所有广播片段。

description.english: Listen to Tomoe's lesson on swords.
description.schinese: 聆听巴姐关于日本刀的课程

description.english: Get caught helping the headmistress skip out of work.
description.schinese: 帮助女校长逃课被抓。

description.english: Enjoy your first date with Ricca.
description.schinese: 享受与莉卡的第一次约会。

description.english: Discover Ricca's true age.
description.schinese: 了解莉卡的真实年龄。

description.english: Encounter the mysterious girl linked to London's fog.
description.schinese: 遇到与伦敦大雾有关的神秘女孩。

description.english: Uncover Ricca's painful past.
description.schinese: 揭开莉卡痛苦的过去。

description.english: Stop Ricca from summoning a typhoon to London.
description.schinese: 阻止莉卡把台风降到伦敦。

description.english: Complete Ricca's Route.
description.schinese: 完成莉卡线

displayName.english: United Under the Cherry Blossom Tree

description.english: Begin dating Charles.
description.schinese: 开始和夏露露约会。

description.english: Discover Charles' secret burden.
description.schinese: 发现夏露露不为人知的重负。

description.english: Witness Charles' flashback.
description.schinese: 见证夏露露的回忆。

description.english: Bring the miracle to its end.
description.schinese: 结束这场奇迹。

description.english: Complete Charles' Route.
description.schinese: 完成夏露露线

description.english: Ignore a sign of change.
description.schinese: 忽略异变的迹象。

description.english: Intentionally invade the dreams of others.
description.schinese: 故意侵入他人的梦。

description.english: Wander between dreams as you try to return.
description.schinese: 徘徊在你试图折返时的梦境之间。

description.english: Escape from the dream world with Himeno.
description.schinese: 与姬乃一起逃出梦境世界。

description.english: Complete Himeno's Route.
description.schinese: 完成姬乃线

description.english: Clear up Sara's misunderstanding and share your first kiss.
description.schinese: 澄清莎拉的误解，分享你的初吻。

description.english: Make your love known to everyone at once.
description.schinese: 立刻让大家都知道你的爱情。

description.english: Survive the commotion caused by Sara's nightmare.
description.schinese: 从莎拉的噩梦引起的混乱中幸存下来。

description.english: Watch Sara's incredible performance in the Queen's Cup.
description.schinese: 观看莎拉在女王杯上的精彩表现。

description.english: Take the shot to determine your future.
description.schinese: 射出这球，决定你的未来。

description.english: Complete Sara's Route
description.schinese: 完成莎拉线

description.english: Spend Christmas Eve with Aoi.
description.schinese: 与小葵共度平安夜。

description.english: Face rejection on Valentine's.
description.schinese: 情人节面临拒绝。

description.english: Disarm a bomb under Tower Bridge.
description.schinese: 拆除塔桥下的炸弹。

description.english: Lose your first kiss to Aoi.
description.schinese: 把你的初吻送给小葵。

description.english: Operate the command center and prevent a mass-bombing.
description.schinese: 操作指挥中心，防止大规模爆炸。

description.english: Begin dating Aoi.
description.schinese: 和小葵开始约会

description.english: Uncover Aoi's secret.
description.schinese: 揭开小葵的秘密。

description.english: Go back to the beginning.
description.schinese: 完成返始，回到最初。

description.english: Form a new organization to handle a national threat.
description.schinese: 成立一个新的组织来应对国家的威胁。

description.english: Bolster your ranks to face the threat.
description.schinese: 加强你的队伍以面对威胁。

description.english: Witness someone injured by a bomb.
description.schinese: 目睹有人被炸弹炸伤。

description.english: Regain Sakura's memories.
description.schinese: 找回樱的记忆。

description.english: Head hand-in-hand to claim your future.
description.schinese: 携手并进，共迎未来。

description.english: Go back to the beginning, one last time.
description.schinese: 最后一次返始。

description.english: Fulfill the century-old promise.
description.schinese: 兑现跨越百年的约定。

description.english: Reunite with Sakura.
description.schinese: 与樱再会。

description.english: Agree to Suginami's plan.
description.schinese: 同意杉并的计划。

description.english: Enlist the aid of the entire old cast.
description.schinese: 争取所有老同学的帮助。

displayName.english: Ultimate Battle of the Cherry Blossom Breeze

description.english: Launch the final event of the festival.
description.schinese: 发起祭典的最后一项活动。
